name: 燃烧
desc: [Burning] Burning ground. Inflicts [<style=C4>Scorch</style>] on the character passing or staying for <style=red>2</style> turns. Walking on it consumes an additional <style=red>0.5</style> Movement per tile.

name: 冰冻
desc: [Frosty Tile]. A character knocked back on frosty ground will continue to slide until it reaches the edge of the Frosty Ground, then get knocked back. Walking on it consumes an additional <style=red>1</style> Movement per tile.

name: 肮脏
desc: [Filthy] Filthy ground, inflicts [<style=C5>Drained</style>] on the character passing or staying.

name: 圣域
desc: [Stigmata Realm] emits the strength of Tarot. When a character stays, <style=red>2</style> stacks of [Stigmata] is actived. This effect lasts until end of battle.

name: 香料
desc: [Spice] permeates the air. When a character stays, there's a 100% chance to [dodge] Ranged Single-target Attacks. When Spice takes [AoE DMG], it's destroyed and deals DMG equal to <style=red>60%</style> of HP.

name: 烈酒
desc: [Liquor] Emits the fragrance of wine. Inflicts [<style=C4>Liquor</style>] on the character passing or staying for <style=red>2</style> turns. The tile can be ignited by [<style=C4>Fire</style>] attacks. Walking on it consumes an additional <style=red>0.5</style> Movement per tile.

name: 黑泥
desc: [Black Sludge] It seems to be alive. When a character passes by or stays, [Corrosion] is inflicted, lasting until the end of the battle.

name: 魔力粉尘（即死）
desc: [Magic Dust] Inflicts [Magic Dust] on the character passing or staying, defeating them immediately.

name: 冥火
desc: [Dark Fire] Spreads to surrounding tiles at the end of the turn. Characters passing through or staying on it will suffer DMG equal to 35% of their max HP and will be unable to recover HP during that time.

name: 散失的力量（即死）
desc: [Dissipated "Strength"] spreads at the beginning of each turn. When allies stay on it, they are immediately defeated. It can be replaced by other tile effects.

name: 不稳定黑泥
desc: [Unstable Sludge] Seems to have a life of its own. Foe characters do not consume Movement when passing through. When ally characters stay on it, [Corrosion - Extra] is inflicted, dealing [piercing DMG] equal to <style=red>60%</style> of their HP, unable to receive healing, lasting until the end of battle, which can be overlaid by other tile effects.

name: 烟雾
desc: <style=green>[Invisibility]</style> is granted while inside the [smoke] that fills the air.

name: 网
desc: [Web] A tile covered by nets. Inflicts [<style=C4>Snared</style>] on the character passing or staying. Walking on it consumes an additional <style=red>0.5</style> Movement per tile. The tile will return to normal when hit by an AoE attack.

name: 酥麻软垫
desc: [Tingling Mat] Enemies on the Tingling Mat will exit the battle.
